appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.wrapLinesDescription: Enable text wrapping in table cells
appearance.stickyFirstColumnDescription: Keep the first column fixed when scrolling horizontally
appearance.stickyLastColumnDescription: Keep the last column (Actions) fixed when scrolling horizontally
appearance.columnReorderingDescription: Allow dragging column headers to reorder columns
appearance.indentDescription: Number of spaces for indentation in Beancount files
appearance.invertGainsLossesColorsDescription: Invert color scheme for gains and losses
appearance.invertIncomeLiabilitiesEquityDescription: Invert color scheme for income, liabilities, and equity
appearance.showAccountsWithZeroBalanceDescription: Display accounts even if they have zero balance
appearance.showAccountsWithZeroTransactionsDescript: Display accounts even if they have no transactions
appearance.showClosedAccountsDescription: Display accounts that have been closed
appearance.sidebarShowQueriesDescription: Number of queries to show in sidebar
appearance.upcomingEventsDescription: Number of upcoming events to display
appearance.uptodateIndicatorGreyLookbackDaysDescrip: Number of days to look back for up-to-date indicator

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.defaultPageDescription: Default page to show when opening the application
workspace.autoReloadDescription: Automatically reload when file changes are detected
workspace.useExternalEditorDescription: Use external editor for editing Beancount files

beancountFile.title: Beancount File
beancountFile.filePathDescription: Enter the full path to your Beancount ledger file.
beancountFile.filePathHint: To create a new Beancount file, create it manually using a text editor and then enter its path here.
beancountFile.filePathExample: Example: Create a file named ledger.beancount in your Documents folder, then enter the path ~/Documents/ledger.beancount or /Users/username/Documents/ledger.beancount.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.beancountFilePathNotSet: Beancount file path not set. Please configure it in Settings.
accounts.checkBeancountFilePath: Please check that the Beancount file path is set correctly in Settings.
accounts.errorsMayPreventLoading: These errors may prevent accounts from loading correctly. Please fix them in your Beancount file.
accounts.checkLineNumber: Check the line number mentioned in each error and verify that:
accounts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete account
accounts.importDescription: Upload an Excel file with columns: Account Name, Type, Open Date, Currency (optional), Notes (optional)
accounts.uploadExcelFile: Upload Excel file with columns: Account Name, Type, Open Date, Currency (optional), Notes (optional)
accounts.excelAccountName: Account Name: Full account path (e.g., Assets:Bank:Checking)
accounts.excelType: Type: Assets, Liabilities, Equity, Income, or Expenses
accounts.excelOpenDate: Open Date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 2024-01-01)
accounts.excelCurrency: Currency: (Optional) Currency code, defaults to INR
accounts.noAccountsFound: No accounts found. Make sure your Beancount file has account definitions (e.g., "2024-01-01 open Assets:Checking").
accounts.fileNotFoundInstructions: The file path in Settings may be incorrect or the file doesn't exist. Please:
accounts.goToSettings: Go to Settings and verify the Beancount file path
accounts.useSelectFile: Use the "Select File" button to choose the correct file
accounts.manuallyEnterPath: Or manually enter the correct full path to your Beancount file
accounts.makeSureFileExists: Make sure the file exists at the specified location
accounts.accountNameMustUseColons: Account name must use colon separators (e.g., Assets:Bank:Checking)
accounts.accountNamePartsCannotBeEmpty: Account name parts cannot be empty (e.g., Assets::Checking is invalid)
accounts.accountNameDescription: Account names must use colons and will be auto-capitalized (e.g., Assets:Bank:Checking)

budget.title: Budget
budget.noBudgetsSet: No budgets set for this period

bills.title: Bills
bills.description: Manage your recurring bills and payments
bills.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this bill?

goals.title: Goals
goals.description: Set and track your financial goals
goals.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this goal?

debt.title: Debt & Liabilities
debt.description: Track and manage your debts and liabilities

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: Track your assets and their values

recurring.title: Recurring Transactions
recurring.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this recurring transaction?

import.title: Import & Export
import.description: Import beancount files or export your data
import.mapFileColumns: Map your file columns to transaction fields. Required fields are marked with *.
import.transactionAmount: Transaction amount (positive for income, negative for expenses)
